text:
• Your midwife or 
GP will be able 
to give you advice on where 
to	get	your	flu	vaccine	at	any	
stage	of	pregnancy	during	flu	
season.
• You can ask your midwife 
about your rights at work and 
the	benefits	available.
• You	will	usually	be	offered	
an ultrasound scan between 
eight and 14 weeks. This 
will check the baby’s 
measurements and give 
an accurate due date. The 
scan can also detect some 
genetic conditions and check 
if you are carrying more than 
one baby. Your partner can 
come a
